Message.Title: And this just in...
Message.Msg: ... Jenna Jameson Pleads Not Guilty to DUI Charges Westminster, CA (routers) Former adult film star, Jenna Jameson has pleaded not guilty to driving under the influence when she struck a light pole in Southern California. Jameson was arrested on May 25 after her Range Rover struck the pole in Westminster, resulting in minor injuries. Prosecutors in Orange County say tests showed her blood-alcohol level was well above the legal limit. Jameson has pleaded not guilty and wants the case thrown out, stating, “Well, I’m a little foggy about that night, but, based on my screen career, I’m pretty sure that wasn’t a breathalyzer the officer asked me to blow in to!!!”
Well, that was a good start to the day.

Message.Title: AT&T to 40 and staying put!! Stop Gambling
Message.Msg: AT&T Stock holder for the next 20 years!! DIVVY baby, free money. AT&T will hit the 40.00 mark before year end. I have worked on the Wireless division for 15 years now. Many may remember AWE stock symbol. AT&T Wireless, a subsidiary of AT&T. Then the bidding war between Deutch Telecom and Cingular ( SBC and Bell South ). off course Cingular won. AT&T is a monster and the Gove does not want AT&T to buy T Mobile. AT&T is doing well with the data plans and its voice over IP plans in the years to come. Uverse will take off and take over cable companies eventually. I see $40.00 ahead. why wouldnt you just stay in and collect the 5% dividend a year? The market is way to volatile at this time. Stay in people keep collecting free money, if you dont sell and go through the ups and downs, you will still make money.
Go have a few more jd's and come back when you sober up. Ignored.

Topic.Title: AT&T to 40 and staying put!! Stop Gambling

Message.Msg: I'm staying in and still making money on the ups and downs.I sell covered calls and buy puts when T goes above the Bollinger Band like it is now. Then I buy the calls back and sell the puts after it corrects. When it looks like it is turning up again, I buy calls and short puts. Next week I expect T to correct back to about $36.60 and then start up again; slowly.

Message.Title: More Buyback
Message.Msg: DALLAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- 7/27/2012 "AT&T Inc.’s Board of Directors today authorized the repurchase of up to 300 million additional shares, representing approximately 5 percent of AT&T shares outstanding, with no expiration date. This authorization is in addition to the 300 million share repurchase authorization approved by the Board of Directors in December 2010." YES!!!!

Message.Title: Cheers for the Buyback
Message.Msg: Great news and I sure like the timing announcement. Short positions will have a very anxious week end, knowing a gap up Monday morning is in order....followed by a continued rise. I just love how they diid a flush out before earnings and briefly after quarter results. Takes out the weak hand longs, attracts and increases the new shorts on "supposedly weakness". Then announce a buyback AH on Friday night. Guaranteed long buyers (those poor shorts). Someone has a good sense of humor at this company. No sympathy. Have a great week end, all longs and shorts--- to be buying long on Monday.

Message.Title: After Hours Quotes...
Message.Msg: ... “Throughout its history, the international Olympic Committee has struggled to spread its ideal of fraternity, friendship, peace and universal understanding.” - Juan Antonio Samaranch http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=66molzUEkWI “One shouldn’t be ashamed to lose. This is sport. One day you win; another day you lose.” – Oksana Baiul, gold medalist "It leaked out that the London Olympics opening ceremony is going to include a showdown between Voldemort and Mary Poppins." - Conan O'Brien “And the line up for the final of the Women's 400 metres hurdles includes three Russians, two East Germans, a Pole, a Swede and a Frenchman.” – David Coleman “The essence of fencing is to give, but by no means to receive.” – Moliere http://media.caglecartoons.com/media/cartoons/82/2012/07/27/115946_600.jpg “I was not talented enough to run and smile at the same time.” – Emil Zapotek, Czech distance runner "After I came home from the 1936 Olympics with my four medals, it became increasingly apparent that everyone was going to slap me on the back, want to shake my hand or have me up to their suite. But no one was going to offer me a job." – Jesse Owens “Finishing second in the Olympics gets you silver. Finishing second in politics gets you oblivion.” – Richard Nixon "Olympics can inspire American kids to get active. Or it can inspire American kids to sit on the couch and watch the Olympics." –Conan O'Brien "I came, I saw, they kicked my Butt!” - Chris Bowman

Message.Title: AHQ (cont.)...
Message.Msg: ... "I suppose they were lucky I'm not a sprinter because that's all over in a minute.” - Australian 1500 meters swimmer Grant Hackett about e-mails he received from women who conceived during his marathon race triumphs http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jLqwu6nbE2E “Deja Fu: The feeling that somehow, somewhere, you've been kicked in the head like this before.” – olympic martial artist http://media.caglecartoons.com/media/cartoons/111/2012/07/17/115265_600.jpg “All I’ve done is run fast. I don’t see why people should make much fuss about that.” – Fanny Blankers-Koen, Dutch sprinter, four gold medals, 1948 “Waving the flag at the 1976 Olympics wasn't my idea. It was too much apple pie and ice cream. Not that I don't love my country, but I felt it was my victory up there, I put all the time into it.” – Bruce Jenner “Today Bruce Jenner is on a stupid reality show, and you can also find him on the list of “Top 25 Men Who Look Like Old Lesbians.” – Michael Heaton “It is the inspiration of the Olympic Games that drives people not only to compete but to improve, and to bring lasting spiritual and moral benefits to the athlete and inspiration to those lucky enough to witness the athletic dedication.” - Herb Elliot “When I was a sportswoman on the East German Olympic track and field team, they dispensed anabolic steroids as freely as here in America they dole out Gator-Ade.” – Dr. Alex Hesse "Every American athlete who wears the Chinese made uniforms will get a free bootleg copy of the new Batman movie." - Jay Leno http://media.caglecartoons.com/media/cartoons/153/2012/07/16/115232_600.jpg “The Olympics remain the most compelling search for excellence that exists in sport, and maybe in life itself.” – Dawn Fraser “People understand contests. You take a bunch of kids throwing rocks at random and people look askance, but if you go and hold a rock-throwing contest - people understand that.” - Don Murray

Message.Title: AHQ (3))...
Message.Msg: ... “All the guys called the Olympic Village a high-class Boy Scout camp.” - Johnny Weissmuller “Winning is great, sure, but if you are really going to do something in life, the secret is learning how to lose. Nobody goes undefeated all the time. If you can pick up after a crushing defeat, and go on to win again, you are going to be a champion someday.” – Wilma Rudolph, 3 golds, Rome, ‘60 “If you can't be an athlete, be an athletic supporter.” – Principle McGee http://media.caglecartoons.com/media/cartoons/95/2012/06/18/113663_600.jpg “A gold medal is a wonderful thing. But if you're not enough without one, you'll never be enough with one.” – Irwin Blitzer “Here's a good trick: Get a job as a judge at the Olympics. Then, if some guy sets a world record, pretend that you didn't see it and go, ‘Okay, is everybody ready to start now’?” – Jack Handey “Ah, isn’t that nice. The wife of the IOC President is hugging the cox of the British Crew – Commentator at the Rowing awards ceremony. “Smith and Carlos aside, I object to using the Olympic awards stand to make a political statement.” - Brent Musburger “The high jump is a masochist’s event - it always ends in failure.” – Terry Tingloff “The essence of sports is that while you're doing it, nothing else matters, but after you stop, there is a place, generally not very important, where you would put it.” – Roger Bannister "How about those Olympic uniforms? They're made by Ralph Lauren and they're beautiful. They're colorful, they're odd. I mean they look like the cast of 'Glee.' They look like the entire navy of Monaco." – David Letterman
